metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000071 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Jasig phpCAS version 1.3.4 is vulnerable to an authentication bypass in the validateCAS20 function when configured to authenticate against an old CAS server.

notes.note: sbeattie> The vulnerability only exists when communicating with a server affected by another very old vulnerability fixed in 2010.

criterions.comment: php-cas package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.6-1').
